description:
是否还在为如何写托福作文烦恼？下面介绍了如何写托福作文的模板，给同学们提供一种写作思路。同学们可以选择性地吸收对自己最有帮助的。

告诉你你如何制作托福写作满分模板>> 创建托福综合写作模板>>
是否还在为如何写托福作文烦恼？无老师教你几招。下面介绍了如何写托福作文的模板，给同学们提供一种写作思路。同学们可以选择性地吸收对自己最有帮助的。 应对托福这种对于学生在写作的逻辑性和文章结构的完整性上要求都较高的考试，一定要准备一个适合自己的模板。那么在准备模板的创作过程中，大家需要注意哪些问题呢?
新托福写作高分T友的作文模板创作秘籍>> 创作新托福作文模板的五步实用法则>>
大家在复习新托福作文的时候，需要准备好自己的写作模板，在本文中，一位在IBT写作中拿到高分的朋友就与大家分享一些自己总结的写作模板创作经验，非常有价值和实用，希望对大家有所帮助。 大家在备考托福作文时，一定会准备一些模版。对于托福作文考试来说，准备模版的确很重要，但是难免会碰到模版雷同的情况。本文为大家介绍如何自己制作模版，希望对大家的备考有帮助。
独创模板拿托福独立写作高分>>  
托福作文考试的备考过程中，作文模版的准备是必不可少的，除了背诵一些常用模版以外，大家也可以试着自己创作一些模版。本文就为大家举例说明如何自己独创托福作文的模版。

description:
沪江英乐：就今晚，让思想迷失自我。瑞典流行二人组 Icona Pop 新单《Get Lost》官方歌词版MV！此曲收录专辑《This Is… Icona Pop》无数闪烁的景色与片段在歌词的衬景下疯狂的出现又迅速的消失，让人抓住却又难以抑制兴奋，蓝色人浪已准备，举起双手。

I woke up this morning
Blurry eye
I've been working so hard staying alive
Well, I don't need this shit
No I won't be long
Before I take that money

description:
沪江英乐：大惊喜！安妮·海瑟薇联手克里斯汀·斯图尔特等一众女星，女扮男装助阵乡村女歌手 Jenny Lewis 新单《Just One Of The Guys》！白色西装上阵帅气逼人，贴上胡子众女神一秒变男神。

【Jenny Lewis 新单《Just One Of The Guys》】

歌词：

All our friends, they're gettin' on
But the girls are still staying young
If I get caught being rude in a conversation
With a child bride on a summer vacation

No matter how hard I try to be just one of the guys
There's a little something inside that won't let me
No matter how hard I try to have an open mind
There's a little something inside that prevents me

It's how I live. You got me here,
Locked in this bathroom full of tears
And I have begged for you and I have borrowed
But I've been the only sister to my own sorrow

No matter how hard I try to be just one of the guys
There's a little something inside that won't let me
No matter how hard I try to have an open mind
There's a little clock inside that keeps tickin'

There's only one difference between you and me
When I look at myself, all I can see:
I'm just another lady without a baby

No matter how hard I try to be just one of the guys
There's a little something inside that won't let me
No matter how hard I try to have an open mind
There's a little cop inside that prevents me

I'm not gonna break for you
I'm not gonna pray for you
I'm not gonna pay for you
That's not what ladies do

Dah dah-dah dah-dah...

description:
沪江英乐：传奇叔 John Legend 励志新单《You & I(Nobody In The World)》，镜头以一面镜子的角度，记录着普通女性们照镜子时的表现。镜子里的你是否知道，一颗美好的心远比逝去的美丽更令人疼惜。

【John Legend 励志新单《You & I(Nobody In The World)》】

歌词：

You fix your make up, just so
Guess you don't know, that your beautiful
Try on every dress that you own
You were fine in my eyes, a half hour ago

If your mirror won't make it any clearer i'll
Be the one to let you know

Out of all the girls
You my one and only girl
Ain't nobody in the world tonight

All of the stars, you make them shine like they were ours
Ain't nobody in the world but you and i
You and i
Ain't nobody in the world but you and i

You stop the room when we walk in
Spotlights on everybody staring
Tell all of these boys, they wasting their time
Stop standing in line, cause your all mine

And this evening I, won't let the feeling die
I never wanna leave your side

Out of all the girls
You my one and only girl
Ain't nobody in the world tonight

All of the stars you make them shine like they were ours
Ain't nobody in the world but you and i
You and i
Ain't nobody in the world

You keep wondering if you're what I'm wanting
You don't even have to try

You don't have to try
Don't try
Don't try
You don't have to try

Out of all the girls
You my one and only girl
Ain't nobody in the world tonight

All of the stars, they don't shine brighter than you are
Ain't nobody in the world but you and i
You and i
You and i
Nobody in the world tonight
Ain't nobody in the world but you and i
